title: Wicked Dreams: Fairytales With A Twist
description: Wake up, Rory. Your white knights await.I have been hidden away and content with the life I am living, but it is not the one I dreamed of. It isn’t an exciting adventure I am loath to leave behind. It’s a dream I need to be roused from and jarred into the real world.Except, in my deepest of sleeps, they are there, touching, tasting, and pushing me further into the darkness where every secret is spilled and a prick of a needle is the final piece of our beginning.Will I have my happily ever after with Hayes, Adler, Gray, and Wade, or will the villains of my story prevail?Join Rory in this dark, contemporary why-choose retelling of “The Sleeping Beauty” in Grimm’s Fairy Tales and find out.Content Somnophilia, abduction, dubcon, knife and blood play.
author: Iris James
